Package com.company.interactives

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
com.company.interactives.Position
com.company.interactives.Interactive
com.company.interactives.Character
com.company.interactives.Enemy
public class Enemy
extends Character
Enemy class contains information about enemies. It contains the combat methods for each enemy.
